Events.OnCreate:
(block (stationList)
(switch ; Need an Ares station in the system which is at least ; 300 ls from a gate (not (setq stationList (map (sysFindObject aOwnerObj "ATE +ares;") 'excludeNil theObj (block (theGate) (if (setq theGate (sysFindObject theObj "GNR:300; -uncharted;")) (list theObj theGate) ) ) ))) (msnDestroy gSource)
; Create the mission (block ( (bestPair (map stationList '(reduceMin original) thePair (objGetDistance (@ thePair 0) (@ thePair 1)) )) ) ; Register for events from the destination station (msnRegisterForEvents gSource (@ bestPair 0))
(msnSetData gSource 'aresID (objGetID (@ bestPair 0))) (msnSetData gSource 'gateID (objGetID (@ bestPair 1)))
(msnSetData gSource 'missionXP 150) ) ) )
Events.OnObjDestroyed:
(switch ; Should never get here as we fail when the freigher docks (= aDestroyReason 'enteredStargate) (msnFailure gSource)
; Freighter destroyed (= (objGetID aObjDestroyed) (msnGetData gSource 'targetID)) (msnSuccess gSource)
; Destroying the destination station is also OK (= (objGetID aObjDestroyed) (msnGetData gSource 'aresID)) (block ( (shipObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'targetID))) ) ; If the freighter is still alive tell it to leave (if shipObj (shpOrderImmediate shipObj 'gate)) (msnSuccess gSource) ) )
Events.OnObjDocked: (switch ; If the freighter docks then fail the mission (= (objGetID aObjDocked) (msnGetData gSource 'targetID)) (msnFailure gSource) )
Events.OnFreighterArrives:
(block ( (gateObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'gateID))) (aresObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'aresID))) shipObj )
; Create the transport (setq shipObj (sysCreateShip &tbCSCAresFreighter; gateObj &svAres;)) (shpOrder shipObj 'dock aresObj) (shpOrder shipObj 'wait (random 10 15)) (shpOrder shipObj 'gate)
; Register so we know when the freighter is destroyed (msnSetData gSource 'targetID (objGetID shipObj)) (msnRegisterForEvents gSource shipObj)
; Update state and player target (msnSetData gSource 'state 'inbound) (msnSetPlayerTarget gSource) )
Events.OnSetPlayerTarget:
(switch (not (msnGetData gSource 'state)) (rpgSetTarget gSource aReason (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'gateID)) 'escort)
(rpgSetTarget gSource aReason (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'targetID)) 'attack) )

Language.Text: "Outstanding mission! That's one less supply ship for the Martians—just a matter of time before this war is over."
